name: Conspiracy Kush
description: Conspiracy Kush by Heroes of the Farm Genetics is a 70/30 indica-dominant cross of Obama Kush and Space Queen. The dense, trichome-frosted flowers produce a tangy citrus aroma and a peppery aftertaste. The influence of Space Queen is felt immediately with a Haze-like sense of cerebral activity, but shortly after the relaxing indica effects take hold and provide calming relaxation perfect for unwinding at the end of the day.
descriptionPlain: Conspiracy Kush by Heroes of the Farm Genetics is a 70/30 indica-dominant cross of Obama Kush and Space Queen. The dense, trichome-frosted flowers produce a tangy citrus aroma and a peppery aftertaste. The influence of Space Queen is felt immediately with a Haze-like sense of cerebral activity, but shortly after the relaxing indica effects take hold and provide calming relaxation perfect for unwinding at the end of the day.

highlightedReviews.text: I like a good indica in the evening, and this one doesn't disappoint.  After a few hits, my head feels like mashed potatoes and I say funny shit and the Mr. and I giggle like hyenas.  Then we curl up together in our hyena den and sleep.  When we awake in the morning, we are humans again.
Perfect for the last bowl of the day. ğŸ˜´ Immediately felt the body-melting relaxation. ğŸ‘ğŸ¼ Powerful indica!

articles.title: New Strains Alert: Conspiracy Kush, Starfighter, Sour Jack, Aurora Borealis, and Marionberry Kush
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
Another round of strains have been added to the Leafly Explorer as per your requests! We've highlighted five of our favorites, but there are plenty more to check out here.Â 
All right, you know what to do with these: indulge, rate, review, repeat!
Â  Â 1. Conspiracy Kush
Characteristics of Conspiracy Kush:

70%Â indica
Cross betweenÂ Obama KushÂ andÂ Space Queen
Breeder: TGA Genetics
Tangy citrus aroma withÂ a peppery aftertaste
Cerebral activity followed byÂ relaxingÂ effects

Â Â Â 2. Starfighter
Characteristics of Starfighter:

60/40Â indica-dominantÂ hybrid
Cross betweenÂ Alien Tahoe OGÂ and Lemon Alien Dawg
Breeder: Alien Genetics
SweetÂ citrus aroma
PotentlyÂ upliftingÂ effects

Â  Â 3. Sour Jack
Characteristics of Sour Jack:

70% sativa
Cross betweenÂ Sour DieselÂ andÂ Jack Herer
Tropical,Â sweetÂ aroma
UpliftingÂ effects with a spark ofÂ energy
May help withÂ fatigueÂ andÂ depression

Â  Â 4. Aurora Borealis
Characteristics of Aurora Borealis:

75% indica
Cross betweenÂ Northern LightsÂ #10 withÂ Skunk #1
Sweet,Â skunkyÂ aroma
May help withÂ spasms, pain, andÂ sleeplessness

Â Â Â 5. Marionberry Kush
Characteristics of Marionberry Kush:

60/40 indica-dominant hybrid
Cross betweenÂ Raspberry KushÂ andÂ Space Queen
Breeder: TGA Genetics
Passion fruit and raspberry aroma
Uplifting followed by relaxation

growInfo.growNotes:
55-60 day flowers
	5 main phenotypes - colors range from dark violet to pink highlights all have a variety of fruity flavors
